archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0657
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Collections solution shall enable business data to be reported. Including: 1. Collections inflow / outflow 2. Roll rates 3. Aged debt and movement 4. Collector performance (payment received as promised) 5. Treatment path performance 6. Delinquency analysis 7. Actions scheduled / completed (suspend, deactivate, reactivate, close) 8. DCA allocation & performance 9. Write-off 10. Payment arrangement / plans 11. Payment extension / promise to pay 12. Never paid 13. Medical dependency 14. Disputes 15. Complaints 16. Fraud 17. Refuse to pay 18. Hardship (can’t pay) 19. Sale of Debt (selection criteria)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
